This guide will show you how to implement a feature store using Xorq and Arrow Flight.

- Implement feature serving via Flight
- Handle online and offline access
- Ensure point-in-time correctness

**Prerequisites:**
- Understanding of Flight protocol
- ML feature requirements defined

Check back soon for the complete guide.
